import scipy.io
import glob
import numpy as np


fns = glob.glob('../input/pcvcspeech/*.mat')
al = []

for i in range(len(fns)):
    mat = scipy.io.loadmat(fns[i])  
    aud=(mat['x'])
    al.append(aud)
    
al = np.array(al)
al.shape
